name: Space Crash (adamkaczmarek)
description:
Game/Prototype made for Weekly Game Jam #118

It's my first project in Unreal Engine and the goal was to make something (finally) playable.

Background story:
The space station has fallen into a swarm of asteroids. As a result of the collision it lost all of its Power Cubes. 

Your task is to fly with Your Spaceship and collect as mamy lost Power Cubes as You can. But You have only ~5 minutes before the Station loose all power.

Steering: 

  • SHIFT  - Accelerate
  • CONTROL - Slow down

Playable on Gamepad.

PS.

Try Hard Mode :)

Game/Prototype made in Unreal Engine.

Space station model: 
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/gravity-generator-space-station-part-6fe80c35f05d43d2a559ad767dec972e
